program.name: log4cxx

module.name: default
module.script-header:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" CXX=xlC CXXFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qnotempinc \ -qnotemplateregistry -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; ia64*-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CXX=aCC CXXFLAGS="-AA -z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+b," ;; *-hpux11.00) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b,"
_apr_config="${SB_VAR_LIBAPR}/bin/${_gcc_subdir}/apr-1-config" _aprutil_config="${SB_VAR_LIBAPRUTIL}/bin/${_gcc_subdir}/apu-1-config" _libdir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB}/${_gcc_subdir}" ;; *-hpux11.11) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CXX=aCC CXXFLAGS="-AA -z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CXX=aCC CXXFLAGS="-AA -z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1009,1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -ptused -FE:template_in_elf_section -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-osf*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=ev5" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=ev5" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath,"
_apr_config="${SB_VAR_LIBAPR}/bin/${_gcc_subdir}/apr-1-config" _aprutil_config="${SB_VAR_LIBAPRUTIL}/bin/${_gcc_subdir}/apu-1-config" _libdir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB}/${_gcc_subdir}" ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-xO2 -xtarget=pentium4" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 -xarch=v8plusa" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -m32 -xarch=sparcvis" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 -m32 -xarch=sparcvis" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac

module.name: gcc44
module.script-header:
_libdir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB}/${_gcc_subdir}" _apr_config="${SB_VAR_LIBAPR}/bin/${_gcc_subdir}/apr-1-config" _aprutil_config="${SB_VAR_LIBAPRUTIL}/bin/${_gcc_subdir}/apu-1-config"
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=powerpc" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=powerpc" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; ia64*-hpux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+b," ;; *hpux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix*|*-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-solaris*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentium4 -march=pentium4" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentium4 -march=pentium4" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=ultrasparc -mvis" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=ultrasparc -mvis" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
# don't build docs again ARGS="${ARGS+${ARGS}} --disable-html-docs --disable-doxygen \ --disable-dot"

module.name: stlport4
module.script-header:
_libdir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB}/stlport4"
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-xO2 -library=stlport4 -features=tmplife \ -xtarget=pentium4" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-xO2 -library=stlport4 -features=tmplife \ -xtarget=ultra2 -xarch=v8plusa" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -m32 -xarch=sparcvis" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-xO2 -library=stlport4 -features=tmplife \ -xtarget=ultra2 -m32 -xarch=sparcvis" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
# don't build docs again ARGS="${ARGS+${ARGS}} --disable-html-docs --disable-doxygen \ --disable-dot"

note.para: Versions of the library for the vendor C++ compiler and GCC 4.4.6 are available in the following directories:

For Solaris 7+, a version of the library for the vendor C++ compiler built with the newer stlport4 library is available in the following directory. -library=stlport4 must be specified when compiling and linking against it.

item.para: Remove support for RHEL 3 and SLED.
